monthly_regional_data.oceanographic_summary: 2016-01 data from Arabian Sea shows average temperatures of 15.6°C and salinity of 35.8. Deep water measurements extend to 2004m depth.
2016-01 data from Bay of Bengal shows average temperatures of 15.2°C and salinity of 34.3. Deep water measurements extend to 2002m depth.
2016-01 data from Equatorial Region shows average temperatures of 13.0°C and salinity of 35.0. Deep water measurements extend to 2019m depth.
2016-01 data from Indian Ocean shows average temperatures of 9.2°C and salinity of 34.9. Deep water measurements extend to 3519m depth. Cool waters suggest high latitude or deep water influence.
